import React, { useState } from 'react' const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const handleLogin = e => { e.preventDefault() alert('Logging in...') // Handle login logic here console.log('Logging in with:', { email, password }) } return (
